name: Yuma
text:
The wind, felt good.
But next... Slow one, would be nice...

name: Oscar
text:
In that case, let me introduce you to a special spot.
It's not a VIP area or anything, though—

With Oscar in the lead, the group walks through the park.
They proceed to a plain side road near the main attraction.

The number of visitors has drastically decreased,
and as they proceed down an even narrower side road,
only [Player]'s group was left.

name: Red Hood
text:
Whoa?
It's like a secret base, I'm getting excited!

name: Yuma
text:
Yeah. Not seeing other people, nice.
[Player], go in together, play with ball.

name: Red Hood
text:
Then I'll go get a ball.
I think there was one nearby!

name: Cinderella
text:
To think they'd even build out this far...
But from a disaster prevention perspective, there are a few concerns—

name: Oscar
text:
You can rest assured on that point as well,
since we have an Assistant Shark stationed here.

name: Cinderella
text:
...I came to see what it was like,
but it seems to be a good substitute for me?

name: Cinderella
text:
Well then, I guess I'll take
a little break myself.

name: Shennong
text:
But that also means other visitors might arrive here.
Be careful not to get too carried away and step out too far, alright?

name: Hogen
text:
Whoa, what's this again, my eyes are suddenly covered...
Watermelon splitting!?

name: Red Hood
text:
—I brought a bunch of stuff you can rent,
like balls and water guns!!

name: Hogen
text:
...Oh, I never thought...
I'd be frolicking around like a child like this—

name: Hogen
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">—Whoa!?

name: Yuma
text:
When you see too much, cover your eyes.
Even wild animals, do it!

options.text: Master, this is all of my daily grudges to you!
I'll leave my share to you!

name: Hogen
text:
Oh, you think you can beat your master just by blindfolding him?
I'll let you taste the exquisite skill of the Tengu of Kurama!!

In the end, no other visitors came.
Forgetting both time and position, the group let themselves loose.

After that, with Oscar's guidance and on a whim,
the group went around various attractions and facilities.

After collecting all the stamps,
they took a long break in the VIP room Oscar showed them to.

name: Hogen
text:
To think I'd be this exhausted from playing...
The fruit juice really seeped into my body.

name: Cinderella
text:
You're right.
This was probably more tiring than my daily training.

name: Oscar
text:
Me too. But... this fatigue shows
that what happened just now was real.

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm a little tired, but I'm glad Sandra had
an innocent look on her face, just like that precious child!

name: Cinderella
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Shall I turn you to ashes?

name: Red Hood
text:
Eek!!
As expected, you seem to be full of energy, Sandra!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: In that case, shall I give you some moxibustion to relieve your fatigue?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: If it's to recover from playing, I'll do it as many times as you want.

name: Yuma
text:
I, a little, hungry.
After this, have work. Want to, eat something... maybe.

name: Hogen
text:
That's right, it's snack time, so
I'll go buy something at a nearby wagon for you.

name: Hogen
text:
However, I can't carry it all by myself,
so I'll have to rely on my beloved disciple, I suppose?

name: Hogen
text:
[Player], I was just thinking
I'd like to talk to you one-on-one.

name: Hogen
text:
Student and police, of the fire brigade and the security team.
We haven't had much time, have we?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha.
You've gotten the first move on me, [Player]!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, the fact that you'd follow me even if I say that, is what's cute about you, isn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, you caught me off guard, alright!
I had a lot of fun, so it's my treat for everyone?

name: Cinderella
text:
Oh, in that case,
I'll have the two of you buy it for me.

name: Red Hood
text:
Ah, but Hogen-san?
You better not take [Player] away from the fire brigade!

name: Hogen
text:
Hahaha, you caught me!
Alright, I promise, Red Hood.

[Player] and Hogen decide to walk through the park
to a light meal restaurant where they can get takeout.

name: Hogen
text:
—So, [Player].
How are your activities in the fire brigade?

name: Hogen
text:
Looking at your two seniors,
I can see that it's a good environment.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, so it's tough even for you?
But if you're training that much, you'll be fine in an emergency.

options.text: The classroom lectures are surprisingly tough!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, it is in addition to your schoolwork.
It must be tough, but the pen is mightier than the sword.
Hahaha.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, is that so?
If your intuition says so, it must be true.

name: Hogen
text:
But, I am a little jealous. I was just
about to have you experience some work in the police.

name: Hogen
text:
—But if you had joined us, we might not have
been able to enjoy this vacation together today.

As Hogen says that,
he closes his eyes for a moment.

He was trapped by his eyes that saw too much.
He felt a little relieved, he thought.

name: Hogen
text:
It was around noon, wasn't it?
I felt like everyone was strangely trying to make me play?

options.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha!
I'll just pretend it was a misunderstanding.

options.text: As expected of my Master, you've noticed.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hmph, my intuition as a strategist hasn't dulled in the slightest.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Whoaah!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Carelessness is a great enemy, karma!
And your polished step-in...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I've been had.
But I'm happy to feel my disciple's growth on my skin?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You...
You've been through a life-or-death situation I don't know about.
Just by looking at that one thing, I can tell.

text:
The remaining Cinderella was alone,
watching the fire reserve unit in the distance.

name: Cinderella
text:
Everyone, you're better than I thought.
If things go on like this, it won't be a problem—
No matter when I have to leave you?

options.text: Master, what were you looking at?

name: Hogen
text:
Hmm, what are you talking about,
[Player], so suddenly?

name: Hogen
text:
...Well, I guess you've figured something out.
I'll give in and talk.

name: Hogen
text:
I can see someone's end.
I can see when their 'connection' to this world is severed.

And so Hogen tells an old story.
Not of a tengu— but of a mere human.

—A long time ago, in the capital of Land of Wa,
an exorcist served the court for some time.

A certain hero visited the exorcist.
And asked to borrow the book on the secrets of military strategy.

The exorcist refused.
But the ambitious hero stepped in further.

He devised a plan to separate the exorcist from his daughter,
the person the exorcist had raised to be his own,
and used her to borrow the book of military strategy.

The exorcist, who realized this, immediately
unleashed an even more elaborate plan to defeat the hero.

—And the result was something he didn't even want to talk about,
a result that was almost too much to bear.

name: Hogen
text:
The daughter, whose 'connection' was severed,
grieved and took her own life.

options.text: Whose story is that, and from when?

name: Hogen
text:
It's the same everywhere, at any time.
...As long as the Role and Rule are the same.

name: Hogen
text:
That exorcist and I were like that.
Therefore, we will meet a similar end.

name: Hogen
text:
That's why— In one world,
there is no need for two people with the same Role and Rule.

name: Hogen
text:
Have I ever told you?
...The Tengu have six supernatural powers.

name: Hogen
text:
One of them is the power to see into a person's past and previous lives.
With this, I have come to know the fate of those with the same Role and Rule.

name: Hogen
text:
The power to sever the distance between this shore and the other shore.
Physical distance, and the distance of the heart... In other words, to sever ties.

name: Hogen
text:
If the disciple catches up with the master—
There is no choice but for one of them to leave this world.

options.text: So that's why you were acting like a guardian.
I thought you were keeping your distance, but that's why.
...How do you explain the sexual harassment?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, as expected of my beloved disciple,
you hit me where it hurts, hahaha!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's that,
and this is this.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
How much have they grown through their daily training?
If I can confirm it with my own hands, I can't help but want to.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—So please put that device away?
And don't just call it sexual harassment as if it's a matter of course?

name: Hogen
text:
...If you were to stand alongside me,
I wouldn't want the scene I saw to repeat again.

options.text: You worry too much, public servant.

name: Hogen
text: Hmm?

options.text: I'll be the one to leave then.

name: Hogen
text:
...You've got some nerve, you little brat.
Are you trying to motivate me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know, I know?
I know my proper distance, so don't worry!!

options.text: To define is to limit, as they say.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, you're saying something wise.
Has some director influenced you?
Hahaha!

options.text: Show me what you've really got, Master.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right, if physical distance alone is not enough for you, then—
Shall we try?

name: Hogen
text:
...We're almost at the wagon we're heading to,
but how about we take a little detour?

name: Hogen
text:
The treatment here is really good,
and I also got a special ticket that lets me skip the line—

Led by Hogen, they took a detour to the
water slider area near the wagon.

name: Hogen
text:
Do you want to compete for speed in a single-person ride,
or slide together in a two-person ride...
No one would notice if we go just this once, hahaha!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright, I'll accept your challenge.
Let's see the results of your training in the fire brigade.

Without having to wait in line with the special ticket,
they climbed the high platform to the starting point.

Then, they waited on the steep lane
where shallow water was flowing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Staff
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you ready!?
Then both lanes will start at the same time...
Three, two, one—
After a short signal, the ground beneath their feet opened, and they slid down the pipe with great force—
The pipe is transparent in some places, so they can roughly grasp each other's position.

They anticipate the course and accelerate by twisting their bodies along the sharp curves.
And as they reach the outside—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hah! How's that!!
With this magnificent slide, you have a long way catching up to me, my disciple!!
The two of them jumped out of the lane at almost the same time, and landed with a spectacular splash.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: —Come to think of it, isn't it difficult for just the two of us to judge?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, winning or losing doesn't matter!
That was a good slide, my beloved disciple!!
As he says that, the old tengu smiles an unfathomable smile.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that's fine.
I'll give you a good hug at it.
Without having to wait in line with the special ticket, they climbed the high platform to the starting point.
And on the steep lane where shallow water was flowing, [Player] gets into a position to be hugged from behind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Staff
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you ready!?
Then the countdown will begin...
Three, two—
Hogen's arms around [Player] tighten just a little—
—Almost at the same time, the ground beneath their feet opened with a short signal, and [Player] and Hogen slid down with great force.
Anticipating the course and feeling each other's bodies, they twist their bodies along the sharp curves and accelerate.
And after being thrown outside and gliding through the air, they landed with a spectacular splash.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hah, how's that!!
This magnificent landing, is the work of the proud Tengu!
As he says that, the old tengu smiles an unfathomable smile.

options.text: (Offer to play in the side pool)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, that would be interesting as well.
Unlike the river-like pool, we can enjoy it more intimately.
Hogen nods at [Player]'s suggestion and heads to the side pool near the slider's landing point.
The classic pool, though does not imitate nature, is also well-equipped with statues that spray water irregularly and a jet bubble area.

When they went in for a soak, as if waiting for them, Hogen closed the distance beyond zero—
And shrank even further.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: I have always been it, so for a change, [Player], you try to catch me!
As he says that, the old tengu smiles innocently and runs away, splashing water on his way.
Until he was caught, Hogen continued to make a fuss without regard for others' eyes.

text:
And then, the time approaches for T.S.L.
The future— That no one had yet seen.
